value.title: Fixing Time Calculations in Power BI
value.excerpt: In this video, Patrick shows why you may hit some issues with time calculations and how to fix time. He typically sees this when using a Data Warehouse.  LET'S CONNECT! Adam walks you through what the changes are to help you level up.  Docs: https://docs.microsoft.com/power-bi/admin/service-premium-what-is#power-bi-premium-generation-2-preview

value.title: Power BI PowerShell and the Admin API
value.excerpt: The Power BI PowerShell and the Admin API allow you to quickly inventory your organization and manage workspaces and access. value.title: Power BI User lookup with the gateway using Active Directory

This can be used for both Analysis Services mapping and the Kerberos SSO with DirectQuery connections. value.title: Power Query! Uggg - Where do you start? | Power BI

value.title: Tracing with Log Analytics and Power BI
value.excerpt: With Log Analytics integration in Power BI, you can now capture Analysis Services trace events easily and over a longer period of time.
